title: Rational Functions - Asymptotes and Zeros - Part B

content.question: Part B Find all real zeros of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>t</mi> </math>, or state that no real zeros exist.

frqParts.text: Part B Find all real zeros of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>t</mi> </math>, or state that no real zeros exist.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
